title: Elon Musk's SpaceX bans Zoom over privacy concerns -memo - The London Free Press
description: Elon Musk's SpaceX bans Zoom over privacy concerns -memo The London Free Press Zoom's security and privacy problems are snowballing - Business Insider Business Insider SpaceX employees forbidden from using the Zoom app over privacy concerns PhoneArena Zoom ca…
content: Elon Musk’s rocket company SpaceX has banned its employees from using video conferencing app Zoom, citing “significant privacy and security concerns,” according to a memo seen by Reuters, days after U.S. law enforcement warned users about the security of the … [+2773 chars]
